description: This file defines a Lightning JS component called 'Home' using the Blits framework. It includes component imports, a template for UI layout, initial state variables, lifecycle hooks for animations and interactions, and a method to rotate loader colors.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning JS component representing the home page with animated logo, loader, and text.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Method to rotate the colors of the loader component by cycling through a predefined color array.
